lang.name: English
app.name: Genshin Impact Wish Gacha Analyzer
ui.text.title.contribution_list.name: Contributors
ui.text.title.contribution_list.descript: Special thanks to the following partners who have contributed to the development of this software!
ui.text.initialize.title: Initializing...
ui.text.loading.wait_proxy_get_gacha_his:
Proxy has been turned on and connected. Please open up the wish history in-game. The proxy will be turned off automatically after the API link of history data has been uploaded. Be patient...

If you are unable to connect the internet while using other App, the Proxy may not have disconnected automatically. Please go to Windows - Settings and turn off manually.
ui.text.loading.loading_gacha_data_uid: Reading the {gacha_name} banner history of player {uid}, {may_take_a_while}...
ui.text.table.title: Table
ui.text.table.name: Name
ui.text.table.draws_count_in_win: Number of Wishes Since the Last Pity
ui.text.count_of_win_by_three_rank: Number of Other Drops (3-Star and Below)
ui.text.update.title: A new version is available! ({version})
ui.text.donate_description: Support us with some coffee money :)
ui.text.issues_report_description: Please report on GitHub for any issue
ui.text.help_translate_description: Unavailable in your preferred languages? Help us translate it!
ui.text.draws_info.msg1: Currently accumulated {accumulate_draws} wishes, on average {averag_draws_count_in_win} wishes per 5-star item.
ui.text.draws_info.msg2: Currently accumulated {accumulate_draws} wishes, It has been {accumulate_not_win_draws} wishes since the last 5-star drop, on average every {averag_draws_count_in_win} wishes per 5-star item.
modules.error.unable_read_log: Unable to read the log file. Please make sure that you have launched the game before.
modules.error.unable_get_gacha_history_u: Unable to fetch the URL of the wish history page, please make sure that you have opened it in the game.
modules.error.unable_get_player_uid: Unable to get the player UID.
modules.error.get_gacha_type_data_api_ur: Failed to get the API endpoint of the wish type data.
modules.error.get_gacha_history_api_url_: Unable to get the API endpoint of the wish history data.
modules.error.get_items_api_url_failed: Unable to get the API endpoint of the item data.
modules.error.get_area_parameter_failed: Unable to get the region parameters. Please reopen the wish history page in the game.
modules.error.mihoyo_api_invalid: Invalid miHoYo API authorization, please reopen the wish history page in the game.
modules.error.mihoyo_api_expired: Expired miHoYo API Authorization, please reopen the wish history page in the game.
modules.error.get_gacha_type_list_failed: Failed to fetch the API data of the wish type list.
modules.error.get_gacha_history_failed: Unable to fetch the API data of the wish history.
